verses.name: 1 Kings 15:27
verses.text: And Baasha the son of Ahijah, of the house of Issachar, conspired against him; and Baasha smote him at Gibbethon, which belonged to the Philistines; for Nadab and all Israel laid siege to Gibbethon.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:28
verses.text: Even in the third year of Asa king of Judah did Baasha slay him, and reigned in his stead.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:29
verses.text: And it came to pass, when he reigned, that he smote all the house of Jeroboam; he left not to Jeroboam any that breathed, until he had destroyed him, according unto the saying of the Lord, which he spake by his servant Ahijah the Shilonite:
